name: Low Poly Town (Unreal Engine)
description:
Behold the largest level I have ever made! A town with full interiors and lots of details packed in.

This is a playable demo showcasing my level/environment design skills in Unreal Engine. Please read the readme text file once you download and extract the .zip files.

If you like what you saw and want me to design environments for you (for a fee, negotiable), please feel free to contact me on Discord @ slightlybonkers#4912.

Feel free to check out my other levels here and here.
